rooms.name: Central Station

items.name: ovChipkaart
items.usage: The ovChipkaart is used to get in and out of the metro

rooms.script:
Welcome to Central Station, the heart of Amsterdam. You are near the entrance to the Metro, but cannot get through the gates. 
If only you had a way to get on the Metro...

rooms.name: Station Zuid

items.name: raincoat
items.usage: The raincoat shields you from the rain

rooms.script:
Welcome to Station Zuid. It is easy to get from here to Schiphol Airport, but you do not have enough money left on your 
ovChipkaart to take a train to the airport. Maybe if you walk around outside to find money, but it's pouring rain...
If only you had something to shield you from the rain...

rooms.name: Zuidplein

items.name: money
items.usage: Money can be loaded onto the ovChipkaart

rooms.script:
Welcome to Zuidplein, located outside of Station Zuid. If you have enough money on you ovChipkaart, you can get from here to 
Schiphol Airport.

rooms.name: Schiphol Airport

items.name: boarding pass
items.usage: The boarding pass can be used to board a plane departing Amsterdam

rooms.script:
Welcome to Schiphol Airport. You need to make it to your airplane before it departs. 
There's something you'll need first, though...
